com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Class ServiceCache

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.services.ServiceCache

public class ServiceCache
extends java.lang.Object

This object store a particular set of services being used in the curernt session.

Field Summary
private  java.util.Hashtable htServices
          Stores the Service objects added to this cache.
private  java.util.Hashtable htServicesCount
          Stores the Services references against their current service loads.
private  int nLoad
          An integer representing the maximum load for each service in this cache.
 
Constructor Summary
ServiceCache(int load)
          Contructor, takes the maximum load on each service.

          Empty the hashtable data to aid garbage collection

          Returns the service with the lowest load count.

          Does this cache contain any services?

          Prints the load on each service to the System out stream.

          Adds a service to the cache.

Field Detail

nLoad

private int nLoad
An integer representing the maximum load for each service in this cache.

htServices

private java.util.Hashtable htServices
Stores the Service objects added to this cache.

htServicesCount

private java.util.Hashtable htServicesCount
Stores the Services references against their current service loads. When the count goes to zero the object is garbage collected.

Constructor Detail

ServiceCache

public ServiceCache(int load)
Contructor, takes the maximum load on each service.

Parameters:
in - load, the maximum load for each service added to this cache.
Method Detail

put

public boolean put(java.lang.String sName,
                   IService service,
                   java.lang.Integer count)
Adds a service to the cache.

Parameters:
String - sName, the name of the service to add to the cache.
IService - Service, the servive object to add to the cache.
Integer - count, the current load on the services being added.
Returns:
boolean, - currently always returns true.

remove

public void remove(IService service)
Remove the given service from the cache.

Parameters:
ISerive - service, the service to remove from the cache.

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Does this cache contain any services?

Returns:
boolean, true if it does, else false.

getLowestCount

public java.util.Vector getLowestCount()
Returns the service with the lowest load count.

Returns:
Vector, containing: 0 = ID of the service with the lowest count; 1 = Service object 2 = The load count.

printServiceStatus

public void printServiceStatus()
Prints the load on each service to the System out stream.

cleanUp

public void cleanUp()
Empty the hashtable data to aid garbage collection
